TestGroupDocumentation.Title: pattern3 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the pattern-3.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a int restricted SimpleType with pattern value "\-\d{1}". Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int pattern-3.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-3-1.xml,...,pattern-3-5.xml documents which specify the values -3, -1, -1, -3, -3 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-pattern-3 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue, elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int pattern-3.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-pattern-3 type with the values -3, -1, -1, -3, -3 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
